gw.api.contact

Class DrivingDirections

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.contact.DrivingDirections
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class DrivingDirections
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Contains directions for driving between a pair of addresses, as well as the total driving distance and estimated total driving time. The detailed directions are provided as an array of DrivingDirectionsElem.

    If provided by the Geocoding service used, a set of maps representing the detailed directions is provided as an array of MapImageUrls. Note that there is no direct mapping between the the size of the DrivingDirectionsElem array and the size of the MapImageUrls; maps may represent either individual stages or multiple stages.

    {@link gw.api.contact.DrivingDirectionsElem}
    {@link gw.api.contact.MapImageUrl}]]>

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      DrivingDirectionsElem[] Elements
      Array of components of driving directions.
      String Finish
      Description of finish address
      BigDecimal GCDistance
      Great-circle distance from start to finish, in the units specified in UnitOfDistance
      String GCDistanceString
      Returns the great circle distance as a user-friendly string, including a short, localized suffix (ie "mi." or "km.").
      MapImageUrl MapOverviewUrl
      URL of overview map showing entire journey
      MapImageUrl[] MapURLs
      URLs of maps of parts of the journey can be found.
      String Start
      Description of start address
      BigDecimal TotalDistance
      Total driving distance from start to finish, in the units specified in UnitOfDistance
      String TotalDistanceString
      Returns the total driving distance as a user-friendly string, including a short, localized suffix (ie "mi." or "km.").
      Integer TotalTime
      Total Time in seconds
      String TotalTimeInMinutes
      Returns the total travel time in minutes as a user-friendly string, including a short, localized suffix (ie "min.").
      UnitOfDistance UnitOfDistance
      Unit of distance for great circle and also for driving directions

    • Method Detail

      • addNewElement

        void addNewElement(String formattedDirections,
                 BigDecimal distance,
                 Integer duration)
        Adds a new stage (instance of DrivingDirectionsElem) to these directions.
        Parameters:
        formattedDirections - text (optionally including html) directions for this stage
        distance - distance for this stage, (a double, in this Directions UnitOfDistance); may be null, indicating no distance or an informational note
        duration - duration/time for this stage in seconds; may be zero, indicating no time or an informational note

      • addNewElement
